name: CursorXP Theme File
summary: Learn about .CURXPTHEME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Stardock replaced CursorXP with its successor, CursorFX, which is compatible with both Microsoft Windows XP and Microsoft Windows Vista. CursorFX automatically converts CURXPTHEME files into .CURSORFX format.

description: File created by CursorXP, a mouse theme editor program allowing users to customize the look and feel of mouse cursors; contains mouse cursor graphics, effects, and trails as well as mouse movement, event, and animation preferences; includes metadata such as author and version; contains cursor images as embedded .PNG files.
